ygData.subject: Hunting Guide?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all you experienced monks out there. What recommendations does everyone have for places to hunt solo by levels? My character is only level 21, but here
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all you experienced monks out there.

What recommendations does everyone have for places to hunt solo by levels?

My character is only level 21, but here were his favorites so far>

Level Area Hunted
1-4 Freeport
5-10 Rivervale (with runnyeye bead quest)
11-12 Black Burrow (with gnoll teeth quest)
13-16 Wisp island (gls quest, good money and exp!)
17-18 EK (gnoll reavers)
19-20 HH (gnolls solo and orcs in a group)
21-22? Gorge hunting mino's
22+? Not there yet............1 bubble to go!

The quests seem to really speed up the leveling. Has anyone else found that
to be true also? Are they any good quests out there for experience once in
the twenties and beyond?

Thanks,

Thors Blazingfury, Level 21, Tunare
